00064                             unsigned int w = 0);

00069

00091                        T minv = 0, T maxv = 0, 
00092                        double zoomw = 1.0, double zoomh = 1.0);

00094       void draw_matrix_frame(Idx<T> &im, ubyte r, ubyte g, ubyte b,
00095                              unsigned int h0 = 0, unsigned int w0 = 0, 
00096                              T minv = 0, T maxv = 0, 
00097                              double zoomw = 1.0, double zoomh = 1.0);
